item.title: Ubuntu_20.04 Startup
item.description: NAT設定(in virtualbox) map 127.0.0.1:22 to 10.0.2.15:22 map 127.0.0.1:3306 to 10.0.2.15:3306 map 127.0.0.1:8080 to 10.0.2.15:8080 sshd 確認sshd是否正常 systemctl status ssh.service 查看是否有啟用sshd systemctl list-units | grep ssh 可以到下列位置查看services的寫法 /etc/systemd/system/multi-user.target.wants 安裝openjdk8 (下載完copy到/opt底下解開) 下載openjdk並解壓縮至/opt底下 update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/java java /opt/jdk8u302-b08/bin/java 100 update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/javac javac /opt/jdk8u302-b08/bin/javac 100 update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/jar jar /opt/jdk8u302-b08/bin/jar 100 安裝mysql 8.0 on ubuntu sudo apt install mysql-server sudo mysql_secure_installation #設定password policy及root密碼(但好像不會生效，root在本機仍可以blank password登入) 登入並將root權限提高 mysql -u root -p mysql> grant all privileges on *.
